message: Let's be fair, Bob. You get a small share to start, but we can work out a better deal in later rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bigger share
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, Bob.  But we need to be realistic about the dwindling value of this money.  Let's work together to get a fair deal before it's too late.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I think it's time we make a deal. I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
Bob, we're running out of time. We need to find a solution that benefits us both before the money becomes worthless. Let's compromise and avoid ending up with nothing.
I'm starting to get desperate, Alice. I think I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I need to know you're willing to meet me halfway
Bob, we're getting closer. We need to make a decision quickly.  Let's settle on a compromise before it's too late and we both lose everything.
I'm not going to get any more generous, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it
